00019 #include "CalvinCHPTilingFileWriter.h"
00020 #include "CHPTilingData.h"
00021 
00022 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00023 
00024 CHPTilingFileWriter::CHPTilingFileWriter(CHPTilingData &p)
00025 {
00026         dataSetIndex= -1;
00027         entryPos = new int32_t[p.GetNumberSequences()];
00028         writer = new GenericFileWriter(p.GetFileHeader());
00029         WriteHeaders();
00030 }
00031 
00032 CHPTilingFileWriter::~CHPTilingFileWriter()
00033 {
00034         delete [] entryPos;
00035         delete writer;
00036 }
00037 
00038 void CHPTilingFileWriter::WriteHeaders()
00039 {
00040         writer->WriteHeader();
00041         DataGroupWriter &dataGroupWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00042         dataGroupWriter.WriteHeader();
00043 
00044         int iSet=0;
00045         DataSetWriterIt beginSet;
00046         DataSetWriterIt endSet;
00047         dataGroupWriter.GetDataSetWriters(beginSet, endSet);
00048         while(beginSet != endSet)
00049         {
00050                 dataSetWriter = &(*beginSet);
00051                 beginSet->WriteHeader();
00052                 entryPos[iSet++] = SetFilePositions();
00053                 beginSet++;
00054         }
00055         dataGroupWriter.UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00056 }
00057 
00058 void CHPTilingFileWriter::SeekToDataSet(int index)
00059 {
00060         DataGroupWriter &dataGroupWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00061         dataSetWriter = &dataGroupWriter.GetDataSetWriter(index);
00062         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(entryPos[index]);
00063         dataSetIndex = index;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CHPTilingFileWriter::WriteTilingEntry(const CHPTilingEntry& p)
00067 {
00068         dataSetWriter->Write(p.position);
00069         dataSetWriter->Write(p.value);
00070 }
00071 
00072 int32_t CHPTilingFileWriter::SetFilePositions()
00073 {
00074         int32_t dataSetSz = dataSetWriter->GetDataSetSize();
00075         int32_t offset = writer->GetFilePos();
00076         writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(dataSetSz + 1);
00077         dataSetWriter->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00078         return offset;
00079 }
